function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruption of supply chains in the manufacturing industry due to workplace closures and reduced production","Impact":"Decreased availability of goods and services, economic downturn","Mitigation":"Implementing remote work strategies, diversifying suppliers, and investing in technology for virtual collaboration","Technologies":"Remote work software, virtual collaboration platforms, supply chain management technology","People":"Workers in the manufacturing industry, economists, consumers","Owner":"Manufacturers, supply chain managers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Disruption and closure of businesses in the sports, travel, tourism, and hospitality industries","Impact":"Job losses, reduced revenue, economic instability","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting domestic tourism, providing financial support to affected businesses","Technologies":"Hygiene monitoring systems, contactless payment systems, virtual tourism experiences","People":"Employees in the affected industries, tourists, small business owners","Owner":"Government agencies, industry associations, business owners"},{"Description":"Job reductions in the travel and tourism industry due to global travel bans","Impact":"Unemployment, financial hardship, reduced consumer spending","Mitigation":"Developing domestic tourism initiatives, providing retraining programs for affected workers, offering financial assistance to impacted businesses","Technologies":"Digital tourism platforms, online training programs, financial support systems","People":"Workers in the travel and tourism industry, job seekers, small business owners","Owner":"Government agencies, travel industry organizations, training institutions"}]}
